article.headline: Army 60, Colgate 51
article.story: WEST POINT, N.Y. (AP) -- Josh Wilson scored 21 points and grabbed six rebounds to lift Army to a 60-51 victory over Colgate Saturday. Army (4-11, 1-2 Patriot League) shot 60 percent from the field in the second half to pull away from Colgate. The teams were tied at 21 at halftime. The Black Knights held the Raiders to 32.7 percent shooting for the game and outrebounded them 32-30. Both teams struggled from the line, with Army hitting 15 of 23 free throws and Colgate 12 of 21. Matt Bell scored 10 points and had three assists for Army. Sean O'Keefe added nine points. Alvin Reed led Colgate (8-7, 1-2) with 12 points and five rebounds. Kendall Chones added seven points and grabbed six rebounds. Howard Blue and Andrew Zidar both had seven points and five rebounds.
